attributes.action: From the parents / guardians of children in Fleming Fulton School, Belfast
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our children with Special Needs have been denied access to a safe and full education for weeks. The parents and children have had enough and want to contact all our political representatives and the media and demand that our children's voice be heard. We demand that our Minister of Education, Catriona Ruane, use her influence to help resolve this dispute immediately so that our children can return to school to receive their education, therapy and socialisation in the positive, dynamic school environment.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
